A4.text: Lesley Gore recorded her first hit song 'It's My Party' and followed it up with ten further US Billboard top 40 hits including 'Judy's Turn to Cry' and 'You Don't Own Me'.

A5.text: Lesley Gore recorded her first hit song 'It's My Party', a US number one in 1963.
